metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9862 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer signedness error in bspatch.c in bspatch in bsdiff, as used in Apple OS X before 10.11.6 and other products, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) via a crafted patch file.

criterions.comment: bsdiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
